ws.agents
Class TurnNotification

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ws.agents.TurnNotification
public class TurnNotification
extends java.lang.Object

Class that represents a turn notification from the wumpus server to an agent. It can be the notification of the beginning of a turn, or the end of a turn.

Field Summary
private  int numberOfActions
          If it's an end turn notification, indicated the number of actions the wumpus server has accepted.
private  Perceptions perceptions
          The set of perceptions the agent senses.
private  boolean turnEnding
          Flag indicating whether the turn is beginning or ending;
 
Constructor Summary
TurnNotification(Perceptions perceptions, boolean endTurn, int numActions)
          Class constructor.
 
Method Summary
 int getNumberOfActions()
          Returns the number of actions the server has accepted.
 Perceptions getPerceptions()
          Returns the perceptions the agent senses in this turn.
 boolean isTurnBeginning()
          Checks whether the turn is beginning.
 boolean isTurnEnding()
          Checks whether the turn is ending.
 void setNumberOfActions(int actions)
          Defines the number of actions the server has accepted.
 void setTurnEnding(boolean value)
          Defines whether the turn is ending.

Constructor Detail

TurnNotification

public TurnNotification(Perceptions perceptions,
                        boolean endTurn,
                        int numActions)
Class constructor.
Parameters:
perceptions - the perceptions the agent senses in the start or end of the turn.
endTurn - true if the turn is ending; false if the turn is beginning.
numActions - the number of actions the wumpus server has accepted.
Method Detail

getNumberOfActions

public int getNumberOfActions()
Returns the number of actions the server has accepted. It makes sense only when it's the end of the turn.
Returns:
the number of actions the server has accepted.

getPerceptions

public Perceptions getPerceptions()
Returns the perceptions the agent senses in this turn.
Returns:
the perceptions the agent senses in this turn.

isTurnBeginning

public boolean isTurnBeginning()
Checks whether the turn is beginning.
Returns:
true if this turn notification corresponds to the start of a turn; false otherwise.

isTurnEnding

public boolean isTurnEnding()
Checks whether the turn is ending.
Returns:
true if this turn notification corresponds to the end of a turn; false otherwise.

setNumberOfActions

public void setNumberOfActions(int actions)
Defines the number of actions the server has accepted. It makes sense only when it's the end of the turn.
Parameters:
actions - the number of actions the server has accepted.

setTurnEnding

public void setTurnEnding(boolean value)
Defines whether the turn is ending.
Parameters:
value - true if this turn notification corresponds to the end of a turn; false otherwise.
